Text: August Deficiency Auction Rescheduled Cc nyisocom writes to the NYISOTECHEXCHANGE Discussion List Dear Market Participants This is an email reminder that the August Deficiency Auction originally scheduled for was rescheduled for An email regarding changes in NYISO ICAP Auction dates was posted to the TIE LIST Server on A copy of this email is attached to this notification for your convenience Serena Barrett Auction Administrator Resource Reliability Forwarded by Serena BarrettNYISO on AM Sent by To ownernyisotech ists cc thebiznet Subject ICAP Attachment A suggested revisions AM Please respond to marketrelations writes to the NYISOTECHEXCHANGE Discussion List After reviewing the dates in Attachment A of the ICAP manual I noticed that there is not enough time between various obligation dates to process information I am requesting that the following original dates be amended with the suggested dates Topic Original Date Suggested Date Deficiency Auction Deficiency Auction Post Results Certifications Deficiency Auction Post Results If the suggested dates are unworkable please respond by June with your suggestions Regards Bob Boyle
